properties.areaDesc: Itawamba; Pontotoc; Yalobusha; Tallahatchie; Calhoun; Lee; Monroe; Chickasaw
properties.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued January 14 at 3:40AM CST until January 14 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
...Flash Flooding possible across portions of North Mississippi through
this evening...

The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a

* Flash Flood Watch for a portion of North Mississippi,
including the following areas, Calhoun, Chickasaw, Itawamba,
Lee, Monroe, Pontotoc, Tallahatchie, and Yalobusha.

* Through 6 PM CST this evening

* Storm total rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected with
locally higher amounts possible.

* Areas of flash flooding are possible. Flooding of low-lying and
poorly drained areas can be expected.
properties.instruction:
A Flash Flood Watch means that conditions may develop that lead
to flash flooding. Flash flooding is a VERY DANGEROUS SITUATION.

You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action
should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

NWSheadline: FLASH FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON
